sentences.english: In such an exigence my uncle's advice and assistance would be everything in the world.
sentences.chinese: 情況如此緊急，非請舅父前來協助指點不可。

sentences.english: Who are your uncles and aunts?
sentences.chinese: 你的姨父母和舅父母又是什麼樣的人？

sentences.english: The boy was named George after his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子隨他舅父的名子取名喬治。

sentences.english: Jenny and David are Robert and Sally's aunt and uncle.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮和大衛是羅伯特和莎莉的舅母和舅父。

sentences.english: His name had never been voluntarily mentioned before them by her niece; and the kind of half-expectation which Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 外甥女兒從來沒有主動在舅父母面前提起過他的名字。

sentences.english: Her uncle and aunt were all amazement;
sentences.chinese: 舅父母聽了都非常驚訝。

sentences.english: Have you heard from my uncle?
My uncle lives in a big house in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我的舅父住在鄉下的一所大住宅中。

sentences.english: After the girl's parents died, she was made a ward of her uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 這女孩的父母雙亡後，舅父和舅母成了她的監護人。

sentences.english: My uncle and aunt and I were to go together; and the others were to meet us at the church.
sentences.chinese: 舅父母跟我一塊兒去的，別的人都約定在教堂裏碰頭。

sentences.english: Many years ago, my granduncle is a chef there.
sentences.chinese: 很多年前，我的舅父是裏邊的御廚。

sentences.english: In such an exigence my uncle's advice and assistance would be every thing in the world;
sentences.chinese: 情況如此緊急，萬萬非請舅父前來協助指示不可。

sentences.english: Four weeks were to pass away before her uncle and aunt's arrival.
sentences.chinese: 舅父母還得過四個星期才能來。

sentences.english: Yesterday I finally got to hear the whole story about how it went with my uncle's death from my mom.
sentences.chinese: 昨日終於從我媽媽口中得到關於舅父過身的細節。

sentences.english: The man who won the game is my uncle.
sentences.chinese: 贏得比賽的那個男人是我的舅父。

definition: older male cousin via female line
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
